articles.title: No Chickenjoy: Jollibee closes Philippines outlet after woman finds fried towel in meal - AsiaOne
articles.description: Many Filipinos enjoy Jollibee's fried chicken but one woman found no joy in her meal. On Wednesday (June 2), Alique Perez took to Facebook to express her disgust when the Chickenjoy meal she had ordered via a food delivery app turned out to be something else.…

articles.title: Forbes Malaysia Rich List: Robert Kuok stays top, AirAsia’s Fernandes falls out of Top 50 - Malay Mail
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR, June 3 — The wealth of the 50 richest people in the 2021 Forbes Malaysia Rich List rebounded 14 per cent to nearly US$90 billion (RM371 billion) this year, up from US$79 billion a year ago. In a statement, Forbes revealed that after declining fo…
articles.content:
Robert Kuok remains at the top of the list with a net worth of US$12.2 billion. Picture by Mukhriz Hazim
